Instructions

  • Start by adding a new task or new project.
  • If you don't create new projects, the default project "no_project" will be used.
  • This app stores your todos in your browser's local storage to review them at a later time.

Loading Sample Data

If you are feeling a bit lazy and just want to see the app load a few tasks to test, press the Load Sample Data button. After loading sample data, if you add, delete, edit a task or project, the sample data will be saved to local storage. If you want to delete tasks from your local storage, clear browser cache or press the "Clear All Data" button.
